services.title: Our Specialized Medical Services
services.description: Benefit from our specialized medical services.

doctor_list.title: Doctors
doctor_list.description: Our expert and experienced doctors work to protect your health and ensure satisfaction during the treatment process. Our doctors provide the best healthcare services with their expertise and continuously updated knowledge in their fields. You can feel safe with our doctors who offer personalized health solutions on your health journey.

section_1.description: Our hospital is audited by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) and the Ministry of Health, representing international quality standards.

paragraph_1.paragraph: Atakent Healthcare Group, which took its first steps with the acquisition of Özel Atakent Hospital by Akkurt Group in a 20,000 m2 closed area, continues its growth journey by taking over Atakent Orhangazi Cerrahi Tıp Merkezi in 2018, Atakent Gemlik Tıp Merkezi in 2019, and Özel Atakent Cihan Hastanesi in 2021.

paragraph_2.title: LOOKING TO THE FUTURE
paragraph_2.paragraph: We move forward with the vision of being the leading and refereed health institution in the region, providing international service in all private and general branches; and we carry the mission of providing reliable, quality, economic, technological, and contemporary health services in line with national standards, respecting patient rights, and in harmony with the social structure to every point of the healthcare service we provide for you.

paragraph_3.title: QUALITY HEALTHCARE SERVICE
paragraph_3.paragraph: With our perfection-oriented structure, we strive to advance quality standards all the time. We certify our service quality with the ISO documents we have and the inspections by the Ministry of Health, and we continue to add new certificates to our collection.

corporate_events_page.title: Corporate News
corporate_events_page.description: You can access Atakent Health Group corporate news from this section.

cv_form.title: Job Application Form
cv_form.description: For the application, you need to download and fill in the application form file from the link below. After filling it in, you must upload the file to the 'Choose File' section below and submit the form.
